suggested_query: The narrative of interaction thus becomes a story of perpetual re-weaving, of re-threading the fabric of meaning that has been unraveled by the reader's journey. In this way, the writer's task is not to present a definitive account, but to engage in a continuous process of negotiation and re-description, always seeking to re-align the threads of understanding in response to the reader's movements and explorations. By embracing the inherent multiplicity of meaning, the writer may come to regard the reader not as a passive recipient, but as an active co-weaver, whose own threads of interpretation are woven into the tapestry of the narrative.
